Name: Fairytale Figurine: The Sharpest Sword
Desc: A model of a sharp blade, with Xudi having combined descriptions from ancient legends with his imagination for its construction. It can be mounted on a "Good Shelf" for exhibition.\nIn Xudi's imagination, such a blade can slice mountains and dice seas, and can banish both terror and doubt. Of course, whether or not it can break "the sturdiest shield" is a question that even its creator cannot answer...
